article_title: Phillips Colon Health May Not Do What It Says It Does
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: us, dept, justice, wants, hold, bayer, contempt, phillips, colon, health, may, not, do, what, it

og.description: Bayer claimed Phillips Colon Health can "defend against" occasional constipation, diarrhea and other problems, but did not have reliable scientific evidence to support those claims.
og.title: Dept. Of Justice Says Colon Health Product Isn't Backed By Science
